content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I received an AI response suggesting using PyAutoGUI library to simulate mouse and keyboard input to control the game. I executed the "write_to_file" command with the given filename "league_of_legends_bot_pygame.txt" and text "We can use the Pygame library to create a GUI for the bot and display game state info", and the file was written to successfully. In the latest development, I received a message suggesting using the OpenCV library to analyze the game screen and extract relevant information, and I executed the "write_to_file" command with the given filename "league_of_legends_bot_opencv.txt" and text "We can use the OpenCV library to analyze the game screen and extract relevant information", and the file was written to successfully.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "league_of_legends_bot_tensorflow.txt", "text": "We can use the TensorFlow library to create a machine learning model that can learn to play the game based on input data."}}}', type='ai_response')]
"""
